casebody.data:
Wanda Jefferson HOOKER, Plaintiff
v.
STOKES-REYNOLDS HOSPITAL, North Carolina Baptist Hospital, Inc., Employer, Self-Insured, Defendants. No. 633P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Raleigh, Clayton M. Custer, Greenville, Alison R. Bost, Winston-Salem, for Stokes-Reynolds & NC Baptist. Celeste M. Harris, for Wanda Jefferson Hooker. Prior report: 161 N.CApp. Ill, 587 S.E.2d 440 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of December 2003 by Defendants (Stokes-Reynolds Hospital and North Carolina Baptist Hospital) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of March 2004."
